targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  ts as "time",
  value_bigint
from manager.metric where
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('pg.uptime')::uuid
order by ts;

SELECT
  ts as "time",
  sum( coalesce((value_jsonb->>'size')::float8, 0) )
from manager.metric where
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('pg.databases')::uuid
group by ts
order by ts;

SELECT
  ts as "time",
  value_double as "value"
from manager.metric where
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('pg.wal.speed')::uuid

SELECT
  ts as "time",
  value_double as "value"
from manager.metric where
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('pg.wal.replication_time_lag')::uuid

with slots as (
 select
  distinct(jsonb_object_keys(value_jsonb)) as name
 from manager.metric where
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('pg.replication_slots')::uuid
)
SELECT
  ts as "time",
  max( coalesce((m.value_jsonb->>(s.name))::bigint, 0) ) as "value"
from manager.metric m, slots s
where
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('pg.replication_slots')::uuid
group by ts
order by ts

SELECT
  ts as "time",
  sum( coalesce((value_jsonb->>'blks_hit')::float8, 0) ) / (1 + sum( coalesce((value_jsonb->>'blks_read')::float8, 0) ) + sum( coalesce((value_jsonb->>'blks_hit')::float8, 0) ) )
from manager.metric where
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('pg.databases')::uuid
group by ts
order by ts;

SELECT
  ts as "time",
  sum( coalesce((value_jsonb->>'xact_commit')::float8, 0) + coalesce((value_jsonb->>'xact_rollback')::float8, 0) )
from manager.metric where
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('pg.databases')::uuid
group by metric.ts
order by ts;

SELECT
  snapshot as "time",
  sum((value_jsonb->>'xact_rollback')::float8)
from manager.metric where
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('pg.databases')::uuid
group by snapshot
order by snapshot;

SELECT
  snapshot as "time",
  sum((value_jsonb->>'calls')::float8) / 60
from manager.metric where
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('pg.statements')::uuid
group by snapshot
order by snapshot;

SELECT
  snapshot as "time",
  sum(coalesce((value_jsonb->>'total_time')::float8,0)) / ( sum(coalesce((value_jsonb->>'calls')::float8, 0)) + 1)
from manager.metric where
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('pg.statements')::uuid
group by snapshot
order by snapshot;

SELECT
  snapshot as "time",
  max( coalesce((value_jsonb->>'query_start_duration')::bigint, 0) )
from manager.metric where
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('pg.activity')::uuid AND
  NOT value_jsonb->>'query' ~ '^autovacuum: '
group by snapshot
order by snapshot;

SELECT
  snapshot as "time",
  sum((value_jsonb->>'count')::float8)
from manager.metric where
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('pg.activity.waits')::uuid AND
  value_jsonb->>'state' = 'idle in transaction'
group by snapshot
order by snapshot;

SELECT
  snapshot as "time",
  sum((value_jsonb->>'count')::float8)
from manager.metric where
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('pg.activity.waits')::uuid AND
  value_jsonb->>'state' <> 'idle in transaction'
group by snapshot
order by snapshot;

SELECT
  snapshot as "time",
  sum( coalesce((value_jsonb->>'seq_scan')::float8, 0) )
from manager.metric where
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('pg.user_tables')::uuid AND
  coalesce((value_jsonb->>'relpages')::bigint, 0)> (256*1024*1024) / (8*1024)
group by snapshot
order by snapshot;

SELECT
  snapshot as "time",
  sum(coalesce((value_jsonb->>'n_dead_tup')::bigint, 0)) / sum(coalesce((value_jsonb->>'n_live_tup')::bigint, 0))
from manager.metric where
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('pg.user_tables')::uuid
--  AND coalesce((value_jsonb->>'relpages')::bigint, 0)> (256*1024*1024) / (8*1024)
group by snapshot
order by snapshot;

select
    value_jsonb->>'datname' as "name",
    pg_catalog.pg_size_pretty((max(value_jsonb->>'size')::bigint)) as "size",
    max( (value_jsonb->>'age')::bigint ) as "age",
    sum( (value_jsonb->>'conflicts')::float8 ) as "conflicts",
    sum( (value_jsonb->>'temp_files')::float8 ) as "temp files",
    TO_CHAR(( sum( (value_jsonb->>'blk_read_time')::float8  )  * interval '1 millisecond' ) , 'HH24:MI:SS') as "read time",
    TO_CHAR(( sum( (value_jsonb->>'blk_write_time')::float8  )  * interval '1 millisecond' ) , 'HH24:MI:SS') as "write time",
    avg( (value_jsonb->>'xact_commit')::float8 ) as "commits",
    avg( (value_jsonb->>'xact_rollback')::float8 ) as "rollback"
    from manager.metric where
        $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
        host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
        plugin = md5('pg.databases')::uuid
    group by 1
    order by 1

SELECT
  ts AS "time",
--  (value_jsonb->>'idle')::int as "idle",
  (value_jsonb->>'active')::int as "active",
  (value_jsonb->>'idle in transaction')::int as "idle in transaction",
  (value_jsonb->>'idle in transaction (aborted)')::int as "idle in transaction (aborted)",
  (value_jsonb->>'fastpath function call')::int as "fastpath function call"
FROM manager.metric
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('pg.activity.states')::uuid
ORDER BY 1

select
    value_jsonb->>'dbname' as "database",
    value_jsonb->>'query' as "query",
    sum( coalesce( (value_jsonb->>'calls')::bigint, 0 ) ) as "calls",
    pg_size_pretty(
      (sum(
        coalesce((value_jsonb->>'shared_blks_read')::float8, 0)
        + coalesce((value_jsonb->>'local_blks_read')::float8, 0)
        + coalesce((value_jsonb->>'temp_blks_read')::float8, 0)
      )*8*1024)::bigint
    ) as "r (b)",
    pg_size_pretty(
      (sum(
        coalesce((value_jsonb->>'shared_blks_written')::float8, 0)
        + coalesce((value_jsonb->>'local_blks_written')::float8, 0)
        + coalesce((value_jsonb->>'local_blks_dirtied')::float8, 0)
        + coalesce((value_jsonb->>'temp_blks_written')::float8, 0)
      )*8/1024)::bigint
    ) as "w (b)",
    TO_CHAR( sum(coalesce((value_jsonb->>'blk_read_time')::float8, 0)) * interval '1 second' , 'HH24:MI:SS') as  "r(s)",
    TO_CHAR( sum(coalesce((value_jsonb->>'blk_write_time')::float8, 0)) * interval '1 second' , 'HH24:MI:SS') as  "w(s)"
    from manager.metric where
        $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
        host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
        plugin = md5('pg.statements')::uuid
    group by 1,2
    having
    sum(
        coalesce((value_jsonb->>'shared_blks_read')::float8, 0)
        + coalesce((value_jsonb->>'local_blks_read')::float8, 0)
        + coalesce((value_jsonb->>'temp_blks_read')::float8, 0)
        + coalesce((value_jsonb->>'shared_blks_written')::float8, 0)
        + coalesce((value_jsonb->>'local_blks_written')::float8, 0)
        + coalesce((value_jsonb->>'local_blks_dirtied')::float8, 0)
        + coalesce((value_jsonb->>'temp_blks_written')::float8, 0)
    ) > 0
    order by sum(
        coalesce((value_jsonb->>'shared_blks_read')::float8, 0)
        + coalesce((value_jsonb->>'local_blks_read')::float8, 0)
        + coalesce((value_jsonb->>'temp_blks_read')::float8, 0)
        + coalesce((value_jsonb->>'shared_blks_written')::float8, 0)
        + coalesce((value_jsonb->>'local_blks_written')::float8, 0)
        + coalesce((value_jsonb->>'local_blks_dirtied')::float8, 0)
        + coalesce((value_jsonb->>'temp_blks_written')::float8, 0)
    ) desc

select
    value_jsonb->>'dbname' as "database",
    value_jsonb->>'query' as "query",
    sum( coalesce( (value_jsonb->>'calls')::bigint, 0 ) ) as "calls",
    TO_CHAR( sum(coalesce((value_jsonb->>'total_time')::float8, 0)) * interval '1 second' , 'HH24:MI:SS') as "total_time"
    from manager.metric where
        $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
        host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
        plugin = md5('pg.statements')::uuid AND
        value_jsonb->>'query' <> 'BEGIN' AND
        value_jsonb->>'query' <> 'BEGIN READ WRITE' AND
        value_jsonb->>'query' <> 'COMMIT' AND
        value_jsonb->>'query' <> 'ROLLBACK'
    group by 1,2
    order by sum(coalesce((value_jsonb->>'total_time')::float8, 0)) desc
    limit 20

select
    value_jsonb->>'current_database' as "dbname",
    value_jsonb->>'blocked_statement' as "blocked_statement",
    value_jsonb->>'current_statement_in_blocking_process' as "current_statement_in_blocking_process",
    min(to_timestamp(ts) AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') as "first seen",
    max(to_timestamp(ts) AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') as "last seen",
    TO_CHAR( (max(ts) - min(ts)) * interval '1 second' , 'HH24:MI:SS') as "duration"
    from manager.metric where
        $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
        host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
        plugin = md5('pg.block')::uuid
    group by 1,2,3
    having
      (max(ts) - min(ts)) > 1
    order by 3 desc

select
    value_jsonb->>'datname' as "datname",
    value_jsonb->>'query_id' as "query_id",
    min(to_timestamp(ts) AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') as "first seen",
    max(to_timestamp(ts) AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') as "last seen",
    TO_CHAR( (max(ts) - min(ts))::bigint * interval '1 second' , 'HH24:MI:SS') as "duration",
    max(value_jsonb->>'query') as "query",
    pg_size_pretty((max(value_jsonb->>'rchar')::float8)::bigint) as "read",
    pg_size_pretty((max(value_jsonb->>'wchar')::float8)::bigint) as "write",
    (max(value_jsonb->>'utime')::float8)/100 as "cpu_user",
    (max(value_jsonb->>'stime')::float8)/100 as "cpu_system"
    from manager.metric where
        $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
        host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
        plugin = md5('pg.activity')::uuid
    group by 1,2
    having  max(ts) - min(ts) > 0
    order by max(value_jsonb->>'rchar')::float8 desc nulls last

WITH tables AS(
    SELECT
        m.value_jsonb->>'full_table_name' as "table",
        sum( coalesce((m.value_jsonb->>'seq_tup_read')::float8, 0) )  as "rows"
    FROM manager.metric m
    WHERE
        $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
        host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
        plugin = md5('pg.user_tables')::uuid
    GROUP BY 1
    ORDER BY 2 DESC
    LIMIT 20
)

SELECT
  m.ts AS "time",
  m.value_jsonb->>'full_table_name' as "table",
  sum( coalesce((m.value_jsonb->>'seq_tup_read')::float8, 0) ) as "rows"
FROM tables t 
INNER JOIN manager.metric m ON t.table = m.value_jsonb->>'full_table_name'
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(m.ts) AND
  m.host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  m.plugin = md5('pg.user_tables')::uuid
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2

WITH tables AS(
    SELECT
        m.value_jsonb->>'full_table_name' as "table",
        sum( coalesce((m.value_jsonb->>'idx_tup_fetch')::float8, 0) )  as "rows"
    FROM manager.metric m
    WHERE
        $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
        host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
        plugin = md5('pg.user_tables')::uuid
    GROUP BY 1
    ORDER BY 2 DESC
    LIMIT 20
)

SELECT
  m.ts AS "time",
  m.value_jsonb->>'full_table_name' as "table",
  sum( coalesce((m.value_jsonb->>'idx_tup_fetch')::float8, 0) ) as "rows"
FROM manager.metric m
INNER JOIN tables t ON t.table = m.value_jsonb->>'full_table_name'
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('pg.user_tables')::uuid
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2

WITH tables AS(
    SELECT
        m.value_jsonb->>'full_table_name' as "table",
        sum( coalesce((m.value_jsonb->>'n_tup_ins')::float8, 0) + coalesce((value_jsonb->>'n_tup_upd')::float8, 0) + coalesce((value_jsonb->>'n_tup_del')::float8, 0) + coalesce((value_jsonb->>'n_tup_hot_upd')::float8, 0) )
    FROM manager.metric m
    WHERE
        $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
        host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
        plugin = md5('pg.user_tables')::uuid
    GROUP BY 1
    ORDER BY 2 DESC
    LIMIT 20
)

SELECT
  m.ts AS "time",
  m.value_jsonb->>'full_table_name' as "table",
  sum( coalesce((m.value_jsonb->>'n_tup_ins')::float8, 0) + coalesce((value_jsonb->>'n_tup_upd')::float8, 0) + coalesce((value_jsonb->>'n_tup_del')::float8, 0) + coalesce((value_jsonb->>'n_tup_hot_upd')::float8, 0) ) as "rows"
FROM manager.metric m
INNER JOIN tables t ON t.table = m.value_jsonb->>'full_table_name'
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('pg.user_tables')::uuid
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2

WITH tables AS(
    SELECT
        m.value_jsonb->>'full_table_name' as "table",
        sum( coalesce((m.value_jsonb->>'heap_blks_read')::float8, 0) )  as "rows"
    FROM manager.metric m
    WHERE
        $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
        host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
        plugin = md5('pg.user_tables.io')::uuid
    GROUP BY 1
    ORDER BY 2 DESC
    LIMIT 20
)

SELECT
  m.ts AS "time",
  m.value_jsonb->>'full_table_name' as "table",
  sum( coalesce((m.value_jsonb->>'heap_blks_read')::float8, 0) )  * 8 * 1024 as "heap"
FROM manager.metric m
INNER JOIN tables t ON t.table = m.value_jsonb->>'full_table_name'
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('pg.user_tables.io')::uuid
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1

WITH tables AS(
    SELECT
        m.value_jsonb->>'full_table_name' as "table",
        sum( coalesce((m.value_jsonb->>'toast_blks_read')::float8, 0) )  as "rows"
    FROM manager.metric m
    WHERE
        $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
        host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
        plugin = md5('pg.user_tables.io')::uuid
    GROUP BY 1
    ORDER BY 2 DESC
    LIMIT 20
)

SELECT
  m.ts AS "time",
  m.value_jsonb->>'full_table_name' as "table",
  sum( coalesce((m.value_jsonb->>'toast_blks_read')::float8, 0) )  * 8 * 1024 as "heap"
FROM manager.metric m
INNER JOIN tables t ON t.table = m.value_jsonb->>'full_table_name'
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('pg.user_tables.io')::uuid
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1

WITH tables AS(
    SELECT
        m.value_jsonb->>'full_table_name' as "table",
        sum( coalesce((m.value_jsonb->>'tidx_blks_read')::float8, 0) )  as "rows"
    FROM manager.metric m
    WHERE
        $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
        host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
        plugin = md5('pg.user_tables.io')::uuid
    GROUP BY 1
    ORDER BY 2 DESC
    LIMIT 20
)

SELECT
  m.ts AS "time",
  m.value_jsonb->>'full_table_name' as "table",
  sum( coalesce((m.value_jsonb->>'tidx_blks_read')::float8, 0) )  * 8 * 1024 as "heap"
FROM manager.metric m
INNER JOIN tables t ON t.table = m.value_jsonb->>'full_table_name'
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('pg.user_tables.io')::uuid
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  to_timestamp(snapshot) as "timestamp",
  value_jsonb->>'full_table_name' as table,
  pg_size_pretty(coalesce((value_jsonb->>'relpages')::bigint, 0)*8*1024) as size,
  sum( coalesce((value_jsonb->>'seq_scan')::float8, 0) ) as value
from manager.metric where
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('pg.user_tables')::uuid AND
  coalesce((value_jsonb->>'relpages')::bigint, 0)> (256*1024*1024) / (8*1024)
group by 1,2,3,snapshot
having sum( coalesce((value_jsonb->>'seq_scan')::float8, 0) ) * 60 > 0
order by snapshot;

SELECT
  ts AS "time",
  (value_jsonb->>'checkpoints_timed')::bigint as "timed",
  (value_jsonb->>'checkpoints_req')::bigint as "required"
FROM manager.metric
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('pg.bgwriter')::uuid
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ts AS "time",
  (value_jsonb->>'checkpoint_write_time')::float8 as "write",
  (value_jsonb->>'checkpoint_sync_time')::float8 as "sync"
FROM manager.metric
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('pg.bgwriter')::uuid
ORDER BY 1

with wait_event_type as (
    select
        distinct(m.value_jsonb->>'wait_event_type') as wait_event_type
    from manager.metric m
    where
        $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
        host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
        plugin = md5('pg.activity.waits')::uuid
)

SELECT
   snapshot AS "time",
   sum( coalesce((value_jsonb->>'count')::bigint, 0) ) as event,
   t.wait_event_type
FROM wait_event_type t
    LEFT JOIN manager.metric m on t.wait_event_type = m.value_jsonb->>'wait_event_type'
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(m.ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('pg.activity.waits')::uuid
GROUP BY 1,3
ORDER BY 1,3

SELECT
  ts AS "time",
   sum((value_jsonb->>'count')::bigint) as event,
   coalesce( (value_jsonb->>'wait_event')::text, 'CPU') as "wait_event"
FROM manager.metric
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('pg.activity.waits')::uuid
GROUP BY 1,3
ORDER BY 1,3

SELECT
  ts AS "time",
  (value_jsonb->>'user')::float8 AS "user",
  (value_jsonb->>'nice')::float8 AS "nice",
  (value_jsonb->>'system')::float8 AS "system",
  (value_jsonb->>'idle')::float8 AS "idle",
  (value_jsonb->>'iowait')::float8 AS "iowait",
  (value_jsonb->>'irq')::float8 AS "irq",
  (value_jsonb->>'softirq')::float8 AS "softirq",
  (value_jsonb->>'steal')::float8 AS "steal",
  (value_jsonb->>'guest')::float8 AS "guest",
  (value_jsonb->>'guest_nice')::float8 AS "guest_nice"
FROM manager.metric
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('linux.cpu')::uuid
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ts AS "time",
  value_bigint AS "running process"
FROM manager.metric
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('linux.cpu.running')::uuid
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ts AS "time",
  value_bigint AS "blocked process"
FROM manager.metric
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('linux.cpu.blocked')::uuid
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ts AS "time",
  value_double AS "fork-rate"
FROM manager.metric
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('linux.cpu.fork_rate')::uuid
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ts AS "time",
  (value_jsonb->>'user')::float8 AS "user",
  (value_jsonb->>'nice')::float8 AS "nice",
  (value_jsonb->>'system')::float8 AS "system",
  (value_jsonb->>'idle')::float8 AS "idle",
  (value_jsonb->>'iowait')::float8 AS "iowait",
  (value_jsonb->>'irq')::float8 AS "irq",
  (value_jsonb->>'softirq')::float8 AS "softirq",
  (value_jsonb->>'steal')::float8 AS "steal",
  (value_jsonb->>'guest')::float8 AS "guest",
  (value_jsonb->>'guest_nice')::float8 AS "guest_nice"
FROM manager.metric
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('linux.cpu')::uuid
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ts AS "time",
  (value_jsonb->>'MemFree')::bigint AS "MemFree",
  (value_jsonb->>'Buffers')::bigint AS "Buffers",
  (value_jsonb->>'Cached')::bigint AS "Cached",
  (value_jsonb->>'Dirty')::bigint AS "Dirty",
  (value_jsonb->>'Slab')::bigint AS "Slab"

FROM manager.metric
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('linux.memory')::uuid
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ts AS "time",
  value_jsonb->>'mountpoint' as "mountpoint",
  sum(coalesce((value_jsonb->>'utilization')::float8,0)) as "utilization"
FROM manager.metric
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('linux.diskstats')::uuid
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ts AS "time",
  value_jsonb->>'mountpoint' as "mountpoint",
  sum((value_jsonb->>'await')::float8) as "await"
FROM manager.metric
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('linux.diskstats')::uuid
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ts AS "time",
  value_jsonb->>'mountpoint' as "mountpoint",
  sum(coalesce((value_jsonb->>'utilization')::float8,0)) as "utilization"
FROM manager.metric
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('linux.diskstats')::uuid
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ts AS "time",
  value_jsonb->>'mountpoint' as "mountpoint",
  sum(coalesce((value_jsonb->>'utilization')::float8,0)) as "utilization"
FROM manager.metric
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('linux.diskstats')::uuid
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1

select
    value_jsonb->>'full_table_name' as "table",
    max( to_timestamp( (value_jsonb->>'last_autovacuum')::bigint ) AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') as "last_autovacuum",
    sum( (value_jsonb->>'autovacuum_count')::bigint ) as "autovacuum count", 
    max( to_timestamp( (value_jsonb->>'last_autoanalyze')::bigint ) AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') as "last_autoanalyze",
    sum( (value_jsonb->>'autoanalyze_count')::bigint ) as "autoanalyze count"
    from manager.metric where
        $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
        host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
        plugin = md5('pg.user_tables')::uuid
    group by 1
    having (sum( (value_jsonb->>'autovacuum_count')::bigint ) > 0) OR (sum( (value_jsonb->>'autoanalyze_count')::bigint ) > 0)
    order by 5 desc

SELECT
  snapshot AS "time",
  (value_jsonb->>'buffers_checkpoint')::float8 * 8 * 1024 as "checkpoint",
  (value_jsonb->>'buffers_clean')::float8 * 8 * 1024 as "bgwriter",
  (value_jsonb->>'buffers_backend')::float8 * 8 * 1024 as "backend"
FROM manager.metric
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(ts) AND
  host = md5('$host')::uuid AND
  plugin = md5('pg.bgwriter')::uuid
ORDER BY 1

list.name: host
list.query: select name from manager.host order by name;
